title: Futuristic furniture-themed background refresh (global + hero alignment)

requirements.summary: Refresh global background styling to a more engaging futuristic furniture/interior aesthetic while preserving readability across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages using SiteLayout render with the updated, more engaging futuristic furniture-themed background.
Foreground text and UI elements maintain good contrast/readability against the new background (no major sections become hard to read).
The existing layout structure (Header, Footer, page sections) remains intact; changes are limited to background/styling.

file_operations.description: Update the global background styling for .wooden-bg (and its ::before/::after layers) to better complement a futuristic furniture-themed backdrop while preserving contrast (e.g., tune opacity, add refined dark premium overlays/gradients, ensure fixed background remains subtle). Keep changes limited to background/styling and avoid impacting layout structure.

requirements.summary: Replace the current wood background image with the new generated futuristic background and wire it through SiteLayout and global CSS using publicAsset for base-path safety.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayout.tsx uses the new generated background filename via publicAsset(...) for the '--wood-bg-url' background image.
frontend/src/index.css (.wooden-bg::before / ::after) is adjusted as needed (e.g., overlay/opacity/gradient) to complement the new background and preserve readability.
The app builds successfully and the background renders correctly in production routing/base-path scenarios (still using publicAsset).

file_operations.description: Add the generated futuristic replacement for the existing dark wood background as a static public asset (keep images frontend-only as required).

Switch the resolved background image from assets/generated/wood-dark-bg.dim_1920x1080.png to assets/generated/wood-futuristic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png using publicAsset(...) and keep the '--wood-bg-url' wiring intact for global CSS consumption.

Ensure .wooden-bg::before uses the --wood-bg-url image cleanly with the new futuristic background and refine ::after overlay/gradient as needed to maintain legibility against the updated asset (without changing page structure).

requirements.summary: Adjust the Home page hero visual treatment so it harmonizes with the new global futuristic furniture-themed background while keeping hero content readable and copy unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: HomePage hero background/overlays (including the existing hero background image layer and gradients) are adjusted so the hero looks consistent with the updated global background style.
No new user-facing copy is added/changed; only visual styling/imagery treatment changes.
Hero text and CTA buttons remain clearly readable on common screen sizes.
